Company Profile:
Established in 2021, Mango Finance PLC is a digital microfinance startup based in Phnom Penh, Cambodia, capitalized by an investment from Vipar Auto FZCO, Dubai. With direct access to over 100,000 customers, we are capturing the opportunity to lend digitally and securely.

Mango Finance PLC intends to transform the microfinance landscape in Cambodia by leveraging the powers of technology and data. We believe in improving access to capital for the unbanked in Cambodia, with our proprietary credit scoring engine.

Mango Finance PLC is a licensed Microfinance Institution, regulated by the National Bank of Cambodia. Please visit www.mangofinance.net for more information.

Company Profile: Urban Hub Cambodia is a multi-award-winner and one of Cambodia’s biggest fully licensed real estate developers. We are committed to developing projects that provide the new generations of Cambodia with exceptional modern living and experience of the first world that focuses on “LIVE, WORK, PLAY” yet preserving the Cambodian tradition and identity of community living.Registered in 2017, Urban Hub Cambodia is a joint venture between a Hong Kong-based conglomerate, Goldfame Group, the largest Hong Kong investor in Cambodia since 1992, and a Cambodian-American real estate company, Urban Living Solutions. Urban Hub Cambodia has quickly become a leading mixed-use property developer and the first developer ever from Cambodia to win the most awards including two major regional awards, “Best Condo Development in Asia 2019” and “Best Co-working Space in Asia 2020” at Asia’s longest-running and most respected property awards organized by PropertyGuru. Urban Hub Cambodia is behind the four most award-winning Cambodian projects both locally and regionally, including Urban Loft, Factory Phnom Penh, Urban Village Phase 1, and Urban Village Phase 2. More projects are expected in the near future.

Job Description:
•	Gather business requirement with process owners and relevant stakeholders and design Process Design Document (PDD)
•	Review and Analyse PDD with optimization and implication process, and design Solution Design Document (SDD)
•	Designs and Creates AA workflow follow SDD
•	Analyze, prioritize and fix open issues to ensure timely resolution of issues affecting business applications.  
•	Work closely with external (vendor) development teams and project team (included process owner) to assess and propose the best practice solutions to be improve business operations and productive.
•	Ensure Control Room (CR) availability is running
•	Ensure BOTs are availability and keep running follow schedule
•	Ensure incident or troubleshoot any errors, and identify the root cause and provide timely resolutions.
•	Ensure Administrator Tasks are execute frequently such as: Control Room version update, BOT schedule configuration, User Management, Source Code Repository, Database Backup, Deployment and other Super User Activity.
•	Ensure Process Design Document (PDD) & Solution Design Document (SDD) are documented
•	Ensure system or data architecture/workflow documented
•	Ensure release and deployment guideline is documented
•	Ensure the development is following IT Service Management and Agile Framework
Job Requirement:
•	At least 2 years professional experience in application development with Microsoft SQL Server/Oracle. 
•	Good web based application development and knowledge on Java, ASP.NET MVC, C#, Python...etc.
•	Experience with Microsoft Report or Other reporting tools.
•	Experience in RPA application development, adminstration and operation is a plus.
•	SDLC or Agile development methodologies.
Company Profile:
Amret (https://www.amret.com.kh) is a leading microfinance institution established in 1991 that contributes to the economic and social development of Cambodia by providing a wide range of financial services to meet the needs of the large targeted customers. Amret has strong commitment and long-term business strategies to be a leading financial institution in the market by deploying ambitious digital strategies. 

Amret belongs to the Advans international group (www.advansgroup.com) a major shareholder and international shareholder (FMO and IFC). The Advans group serves over 750,000 clients, and has expanded its operations in nine countries such as Cambodia, Cameroon, Ivory Coast, Democratic Republic of Congo, Ghana, Myanmar, Nigeria, Pakistan, and Tunisia. 

Amret has more than 150 branches, located in 25 cities and provinces in Cambodia, and successfully serves 450,000 customers with around 4,000 highly dedicated employees.

job title: គ្រូមធ្យមសិក្សា និង បឋមសិក្សា
position: គ្រូមធ្យមសិក្សា និង បឋមសិក្សា
Job Description:
មុខវិជ្ជា៖
-​ គណិត ថ្នាក់ទី១០-១១ ចំនួន១នាក់ សាខាទួលទំពូង, ថ្នាក់ទី៨,៩ និង១១ ចំនួន១នាក់ សាខាទួលគោក និងថ្នាក់ទី១០ ចំនួន១នាក់ សាខាទួលគោក

- ជាភាសាខ្មែរ ថ្នាក់ទី៧-៨ ចំនួន១នាក់ សាខាទួលគោក

- ជីវ និងផែនដី ថ្នាក់ទី៧,១០,១១ នៅសាខាទួលទំពូង និង ថ្នាក់ទី៨​ សាខាទួលគោក

- គ្រូបឋមសិក្សា (សាខាទួលគោក)

* តួនាទី៖
- បង្រៀនតាមកម្មវិធីសិក្សាដែលបានផ្តល់ជូន រៀបចំសម្ភារឧបទេស និងមេរៀនចាំបាច់សម្រាប់បង្រៀនទុកជាមុន
- បង្កើតបរិយាកាសថ្នាក់រៀនដែលផ្តល់អំណោយផលដល់ការសិក្សា តាមរយៈការប្រើប្រាស់វិធីបង្រៀនដ៏សមស្របជាច្រើនប្រភេទ ។
- ធ្វើរបាយការណ៍សិស្សនិងឯកសាររដ្ឋបាលផ្សេងទៀតសម្រាប់តាមដានកាសិក្សារបស់សិស្ស។
- សហការជាមួយអ្នកគ្រប់គ្រងកម្មវិធីចំណេះទូទៅខ្មែរ លើការធ្វើផែនការនិងការកែលម្អក្នុងការអនុវត្តន៍របស់សិស្ស។
- ចូលរួមអភិវឌ្ឍ វិជ្ជាជីវៈនិងសកម្មភាពសាលាផ្សេងទៀតដែលត្រូវផ្តល់ជូនតាមរយៈអ្នកគ្រប់គ្រងសាលារៀន។
ម៉ោងការងារ និងបៀវត្ស៖
- ម៉ោងបង្រៀន: តាមកាលវិភាគរបស់សាលា ហើយពីថ្ងៃចន្ទ-សុក្រនៅពេលរសៀល និងថ្ងៃសៅរ៍ពេលព្រឹក
Job Requirement:
- បញ្ចប់បរិញ្ញាបត្រតាមមុខវិជ្ជាឯកទេស
- មានការអត់ធ្មត់ និងចេះច្នៃប្រឌិតក្នុងការបង្រៀន
- ចេះជម្រុញ លើកទឹកចិត្ត និងយកចិត្តទុកដាក់ចំពោះសិស្ស
- មានឆន្ទៈមុះមុត និងមានការទទួលខុសត្រូវចំពោះការងារ
- មានឯកសារអត្តសញ្ញាណកម្មត្រឹមត្រូវ សម្រាប់ការចុះកិច្ចសន្យាការងារ
Company Profile:
Footprints International School is an educational institution licensed with the Ministry of Education and registered under Eduinvest International Co. Ltd. The school currently operates in central Phnom Penh with one campus in Tuol Kork and another Tuol Tom Poung. Both campuses serve students from nursery to year twelve, covering the Cambridge International Curriculum and the Khmer National Program.

Accredited by the Western Association of Schools and Colleges (WASC), our community considers innovative approaches to teaching and learning the centric method to gear students’ towards our school wide learner outcomes. We support students in developing a growth mindset leading to lifelong habits in learning and a global mindset through which students adopt 21st century skills and sustainable living practices. Creativity is fostered through an integrative and experiential learning approach to Sciences, Technology, Engineering, the Arts and Mathematics (STEAM).

Our school highly values community engaged learning and experiences, with a special emphasis on Khmer Language and Culture. Through this program we aim to ensure that our learning is local, authentic and relevant. The holistic approach of these educational anchors is embedded in our vision, mission and values – and help guide the daily teaching and learning practices of Footprints.

Our core values are Responsibility, Compassion and Determination.
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department   011 555 407 hr@footprintsschool.edu.kh St. 135, No 84, Tuol Tompung, Phnom Penh, Cambodia. 011 555 407

Job Description:
1. Send and received post both documents and products  
2. Prepare purchase orders and buying when necessary 
3. Contact suppliers in order to schedule of expedite deliveries, missed, late or other problems 
4. Check shipments when they arrive to ensure that orders have been filled correctly and that goods meet specifications
5. Work closely with store managers to ensure the inventory is delivered to the stores on time 
6. Respond to store manager and supplier inquiries order status, changes or cancellation 
7. Submit final invoices to the Finance and Accounts Department
8. Prepare, maintain, and review purchasing files, reports and prices lists
9. Maintain purchasing database of suppliers and other purchasing documents
10. Track the status of requisitions, contracts and approve bill to account department for payment
11. Perform other tasks as assigned by supervision.
Job Requirement:
1. Bachelor’s degree in accounting, management or related fields 
2. Have at least 1 year experience in Procurement, Stock, Purchasing or related fields 
3. Ability to develop purchasing planning, market survey and working procedure 
4. Have a good communication, interpersonal skill, influencing skills, hardworking, and honesty
5. Good knowledge in English both written and verbal communication 
6. Good knowledge of computer applications MS office, Internet, Email & Outlook
7. Be able to work under pressure, tight timeline, strong Interpersonal skill

Job Description:
1. Assist the store manager for daily operations. 
2. Ensure that the team will provide good service to customers. 
3. Assist the team in resolving issues related to in-store operations. 
4. Participate in staff orientation, training and development.
5. Have the staff clean the shop clean, hygienic and safe. 
6. Verify stock and recalculate stock, both wholesale and retail, when the store manager is not present.
7. Organize storage of various products, warehousing, fill inventory, receive goods and count monthly stocks
8. Count the best-selling wines every week
9. Receive orders and issue invoices to customers 
10. Check security cameras when there is a loss of goods
11. Manage cashier, warehouse staff, delivery staff, ...
12. Reception in the store when customers need, pick up the phone when customers call.

1. Bachelor's degree or higher in Business Administration, Management or related field.
2. At least 1year’ experience as an assistant store manager, store manager, market ... or in the field related to wine and beverage products ...
3. Good communication skills with customers and product introduction.
4. Good Communication in English both speaking and writing. 
5. Be proactive and work oriented to employees well.
6. Always have a positive attitude in all situations where there is a problem or an issue that arises responsibly.
7. Computer literate Microsoft Office Word, Excel, Email, Internet.
8. Overall, what the store needs from the staff is the ability to work honestly (for the company, the customers themselves and the team) and a dedicated staff

Job Description: - Understand the features and benefits of the JLR offer (vehicles, Service costs and plans, warranty, accessories) and how these compare with other premium automotive brands.- Uses an understanding of the offer and the Jaguar and Land Rover brands to develop a distinctive and compelling sale proposition for corporate customers.- Formulate annual marketing plan and annual budget while also ensuring plan executive.- Keep the information of the automotive industry updated and actively seek feedback and input from the Sales Team for marketing activities and competitor information.- Understands and uses a range of local marketing activities (e.g. events, advertisements, fliers, website page,driving events) to develop new business including developing relationships with advertising agencies, media, and key stakeholders to promote the public image of JLR.- Researching, tracking, and updating the management on all political and economic issues in Cambodia, mainly related to the automotive industry as well as changes in the competitive environment for vehicles in Cambodia.- Purchasing and inventory control of branded stationary, giveaways, and other premium items Led and coached the marketing and sales team in order to carry out the plan by creating and implementing product training.- Regular reporting of marketing activities and competitive activities to the management.
Job Requirement: - Full understanding of product ranges available to customers.- Knowledge of JLR Customer First Behaviors- Knowledge of Jaguar Land Rover Operational Guidelines and standards.- A minimum of 3-5 years of Marketing Management experience (automotive preferred / luxury brands an alternative).
Company Profile:
RMA entered the Cambodian market in 1992 as an exclusive provider of dedicated system solutions for commercial and non-commercial enterprises in the sectors of infrastructure, energy and logistics. Gradually, the company has been growing alongside the development of Cambodia and expanded to automotive, agricultural and heavy equipment, warehouse solutions, financial services, car rental and food franchise management.  In addition to business expansion, RMA Cambodia has also focused its attention on human resources by providing internships and employment opportunities to approximately 2,000 local and professional staff with a number of expatriates working together to share their skills and expertise.

RMA Cambodia has also been very active within local communities. We consistently work with local authorities and organizations to provide financial and technical assistance in essential key sectors, such as health, environment, education and sports.

We aim to help Cambodia grow and prosper.

OUR SERVICES AND PRODUCTS:

RMA Cambodia and its affiliate Asia Vehicle Rental (AVR) are offering franchised car rental services through the global brand AVIS. Rentals are customized with brand-new Ford vehicles and experienced English-speaking chauffeurs. AVIS also offers car rental and leasing that meets all types of customers requirements for business trips, leisure or field work, with or without chauffeurs.

RMA Cambodia has a financing arm, RMA Financial Services, offers financing solutions to flexibly meet the needs of corporate and retail customers for the purchase of their own automotive and heavy equipment, agricultural machinery and warehouse solution equipment.

RMA Cambodia is also a provider of heavy equipment products and solutions in construction, road building and maintenance, and agriculture, namely JCB, Mitsubishi FUSO and John Deere. RMA Cambodia is an agent for the world’s leading brands in these industries.
Contact Info: Contact Information RMA CAMBODIA  017888390 recruitment.kh@rmagroup.net Phnom Penh #27, St. 134, SangkatMittapheap, Khan 7 Makara, Phnom Penh 017888390

Job Description:
- Manage all Compliance related tasks/duties on a daily basis.
- Develop and oversee control systems to prevent or deal with violations of legal and internal Compliance guidelines and policies.
- Revise and implement policies, procedures, reports, inspections etc. periodically to identify hidden risks or non-conformity issues.
- Responsible for all Compliance Audits and Corrective Actions.
- Collaborate with all internal departments to monitor enforcement of standards and regulations.
- Identify non-compliance risks and their corrective actions.
- Review the work of colleagues when necessary to identify compliance issues and provide advice or training.
- Responsible for all current and new Compliance duties
Job Requirement:
1- Relevant bachelor’s degree, or equivalent combination of education and experience
2- Knowledge of the continuous improvement technics (5S, Kaizen, lean management, etc…)
3- General computer skills (MS Excel, Word…)
4- Fluent in Khmer and English (writing and speaking), Chinese language knowledge is an advantage.
5- Able to perform multi audit programs at the same time.
6- Knowledge of Cambodian Labour Law & Compliance Law.
7- High level of efficiency and accuracy, strong attention to detail, organizational, and leadership skills.
8- Common sense and proactive, Problem solving and “let’s do it” attitude.
9- At least 3-years work experience in the areas of either Social Compliance/ Corporate Social Responsibility Audit, HR/Admin or Legal Consultancy.
10- Able to work independently with limited supervision.
Contact Info: Contact Information Hong Lin   linhonglin@haitan-hb.com No:402,Street 105R, Phm Toul Sangke ,Sangkat Toul Sangke, Khan Russey Keo, Phnom Penh , Cambodia.

Job Description: • Maximize sales and deliver the most (share to concept to achieve) effective and creative sales strategies• Make Cold calls to arrange meetings with and show potential customers around a property and answers all enquiries• Participate in networking, business and social events and ensure they adhere to sales budget• Finding and understanding buyers’ want in a position to proceed with purchase and willing to pay the price• Convincing prospective clients that the property is the right one to live or to invest• Develop and maintain relationship with customers and other stakeholders• Conduct and update research on competitors and market conditions (Rental Rate-Office, Apartment, Retail space)• Ensure that client profiles and all required documents are accurate and complete• Prepare and record booking forms and contracts accurately• Develop, maintain & update the sales department database• Sending out details of new properties on the market to people on database• Coordinate with project management team to verify unit modifications• Liaise between accounting and clients to follow up payments• Resolve the customer complaints by developing solutions and preparing reports• Prepare and manage all sales admin related duties• Arranging advertising to promote the property• Support marketing in event preparation and management• Referring Buyer to mortgage arrangers for quotation and advice• Other tasks assigned by Line Manager
Job Requirement: • Bachelor’s degree in business administration or related fields• At least 2 years of work experience in property development or real estate company• Good at mathematic• Good at English, knowing basic Chinese is an advantage• Good understanding on property tax• Strong interpersonal skills, Sales skills, Marketing skills, and/or management skills• Good at public speaking• Able to work under pressure• Able to work in team and responsible in work• Able to use Ms. Office, Internet & Email
